Questions.Question: 1) Why is AWS more economical than traditional data centers for applications with varying compute workloads?

Reponses.Reponse_1: A) Amazon EC2 costs are billed on a monthly basis
Reponses.Reponse_2: B) Users retain full administrative access to their Amazon EC2 instances
Reponses.Reponse_3: C) Amazon EC2 instances can be launched on demand when needed.
Reponses.Reponse_4: D) Users can permanently run enough instances to handle peak workloads
Reponses.Reponse_vrai: C) Amazon EC2 instances can be launched on demand when needed

Questions.Question: 2) Which AWS service would simplify the migration of a database to AWS?

Reponses.Reponse_2: B) AWS Database Migration Service (AWS DMS)
Reponses.Reponse_vrai: B) AWS Database Migration Service (AWS DMS)

Questions.Question: 3) Which AWS offering enables users to find, buy, and immediately start using software solutions in their AWS environment?
4) Which AWS networking service enables a company to create a virtual network within AWS?

Reponses.Reponse_4: D) Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (Amazon VPC
Reponses.Reponse_vrai: D) Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (Amazon VPC
